articles.title: Artbox returns in February as an indoor event at the Singapore Expo - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Expect art installations, food and drinks, music and… the Beam of Pain? Artbox 2023 takes place over two weekends, starting Feb 24.
articles.content: As for music, there will be performances from artistes from Cross Ratio Entertainment, such as Tay Kewei, Derrick Hoh, Alfred Sim, Akeem Jahat and Calvert Tay. Also making an appearance is Zin from T… [+521 chars]

articles.title: 'You still look pregnant', 'She doesn't look like you': What not to say to a new (and vulnerable) mother - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Do we unconsciously judge or criticise new mothers and their babies? During a time of great stress and transition, some of our seemingly harmless comments may cut deeper than we think.
articles.content: Some months back, a friend of mine gave birth to a baby girl. Now, my friend is an attractive woman, but as she puts it herself, her baby did not conform to conventional standards of beauty. Her newb… [+1100 chars]

articles.title: Honest mistake or 'blatant cheating'? Man pays for 1kg of pork ribs from Prime Supermarket, receives only 600g - AsiaOne

articles.author: Dio Suhenda, Dio Suhenda
articles.title: Indonesia's measles cases skyrocket amid paediatric vaccination lag - asianews.network
articles.description: Authorities attributed the spike to the fact that many children had missed out routine childhood vaccinations during the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
January 26, 2023
JAKARTA – Indonesia saw 32 times more measles cases in 2022 than the year before, amid a slump in routine pediatric immunizations blamed on the COVID-19 pandemic.
